parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the rear brake to stop working without warning, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The rear brake stops working
the ABS module fails
the brake fluid should be replaced every two years to avoid this problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty brake fluid replacement procedure can cause serious injury or death to the rider and/or passenger.
symptoms: The brake fluid replacement procedure is not properly outlined in the service manual
owners are not notified of the change in procedure
the procedure can cause contaminated brake fluid to remain in the system.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Brake Lever Hydraulic Pressure Switch Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front brake lever hydraulic pressure switch can cause the brake light to not activate, and the cruise control to not disengage, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake light does not come on when the front brake lever is pulled
the cruise control does not disengage when the front brake lever is pulled
the brake light comes on only when significant pressure is applied to the lever.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front brake noise can be a sign of a material problem with the rotors or calipers, or a manufacturing error, which can prevent the motorcycle from stopping.
symptoms: The front brakes make a terrible noise when applied
the noise is not consistent
but happens often
the dealer is unable to recreate the noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The recall issues can cause the front wheel to lock up, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The front wheel may lock up
the recall letter does not provide transportation to the nearest dealer
the owner is expected to ride the motorcycle to the dealer for repairs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake hose failure can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake hose does not pass the "whip" test
the brake hose is produced with false data for test results.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to a loss of power, stalling, or even engine damage. This can result in an unsafe condition, especially when driving on the highway, as it can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power or stall, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The check engine light and overheating light come on
the engine overheats
the coolant level drops
coolant leaks onto the ground or rear tire
the water pump motor fails
the engine stalls or loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the coolant system can cause the engine to overheat, leading to a loss of power, stalling, or even engine damage. This can result in an unsafe condition, especially when driving on the highway, as it can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power or stall, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Coolant leaks onto the ground or rear tire
the coolant level drops
the engine overheats
the check engine light and overheating light come on
the thermostat housing leaks
the water pump cover leaks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the thermostat housing can cause the engine to overheat, leading to a loss of power, stalling, or even engine damage. This can result in an unsafe condition, especially when driving on the highway, as it can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power or stall, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Coolant leaks onto the ground or rear tire
the coolant level drops
the engine overheats
the check engine light and overheating light come on
the thermostat housing leaks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the speedometer, RPM gauge, and other essential systems to malfunction, leading to unsafe driving conditions.
symptoms: Speedometer and RPM gauge stop working
low fuel light comes on
engine light comes on
and other electrical systems malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the spark plug wire insulation can cause an electrical short circuit, leading to a fire at the fuel tank, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: Spark plug wire rubbing against the fuel tank
worn-out insulation
and potential for electrical short circuit.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Fire Hazard due to Spark Plug Wire Routing
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The routing of the spark plug wire under the fuel tank can cause a fire hazard, especially when the motorcycle is leaning to the left on the kickstand, increasing the risk of fuel spillage and electrical short circuit.
symptoms: Spark plug wire rubbing against the fuel tank
worn-out insulation
and potential for electrical short circuit.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Safety Concerns with CB Radio Push-to-Talk (PTT) Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The relocation of the CB Radio PTT control to the right handlebar can cause the rider to lose throttle control while operating the PTT control, leading to sudden deceleration and potential accidents.
symptoms: Difficulty maintaining throttle control while operating the CB Radio PTT control
sudden deceleration
and potential for accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the shifter shaft lever can cause the motorcycle to become stuck in gear, making it difficult or impossible to shift, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The shifter shaft lever becomes stripped
the motorcycle is unable to shift out of gear
the shifter and shifter shaft are out of position
the motorcycle is difficult to balance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the motorcycle to become difficult or impossible to control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The coolant system leaks can cause the motorcycle to become unstable, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The coolant leaks from multiple locations
the coolant filler neck leaks
the thermostat leaks
the coolant pump and hoses leak
the coolant gets on the ground and tires
the motorcycle becomes unreliable and unsafe.
